content:
Savory vegan breakfasts with legumes are a fantastic option! Legumes are packed with protein, fiber, and nutrients, making them an excellent addition to your morning meal. Here are some delicious and savory vegan breakfast ideas that incorporate legumes:

1. **Chickpea Scramble**: Cook chickpeas with onions, garlic, and spices, then serve with whole grain toast or wrap in a tortilla.
2. **Lentil Breakfast Bowl**: Cook lentils with diced veggies and spices, then top with roasted vegetables, nuts, and a drizzle of tahini sauce.
3. **Black Bean and Sweet Potato Hash**: Sauté diced sweet potatoes and black beans with onions and bell peppers, then serve with whole grain toast or as a filling for a breakfast burrito.
4. **Cannellini Bean and Spinach Omelette**: Whisk together cannellini beans, spinach, and spices, then cook into an omelette shape with a non-stick pan.
5. **Kidney Bean and Mushroom Breakfast Tacos**: Cook kidney beans with sautéed mushrooms, onions, and spices, then serve in a taco shell with your favorite toppings.
6. **Falafel Breakfast Wrap**: Wrap falafel in a whole grain tortilla with roasted veggies, hummus, and mixed greens.
7. **Chickpea and Avocado Toast**: Mash chickpeas with lemon juice and spices, then spread on whole grain toast and top with sliced avocado and cherry tomatoes.
8. **Lentil and Veggie Breakfast Patty**: Mix cooked lentils with grated veggies and spices, shape into patties, and cook in a non-stick pan. Serve on a whole grain English muffin or biscuit.
9. **Black Bean and Roasted Veggie Quesadilla**: Fill a whole grain tortilla with black beans, roasted veggies, and spices, then cook in a non-stick pan until crispy and melted.
10. **Hummus and White Bean Breakfast Bowl**: Cook cannellini beans with garlic and lemon juice, then top with hummus, roasted veggies, and a sprinkle of sumac.

These savory vegan breakfast ideas incorporating legumes will provide you with a boost of protein, fiber, and energy to start your day!
